```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(tigris)
library(fs)
library(sf)
library(ggthemes)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r download, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
download.file(url = "http://justicetechlab.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/washington_dc_2006to2017.csv",
              destfile = "shotspotter.csv", mode = "wb",
              col_types = cols(
                incidentid = col_double(),
                latitude = col_double(),
                longitude = col_double(),
                year = col_character(),
                month = col_double(),
                hour = col_double(),
                minute = col_double(),
                second = col_double(),
                numshots = col_double()))

dc <- read_csv("shotspotter.csv")

file_delete("shotspotter.csv")

dc <- dc %>% 
  select(-type) %>%
  filter(latitude > 38.7 & longitude < -76,
         !is.na(incidentid))



```
